mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Kingsbury, Charles, Jr. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Kingsbury, Charles, Jr.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Headquarters AOWV 30 1861. By Telegraph from Clarksburg July 30 1861. Capt A.H. Brecks orders number thirty-two (32) are so far modified that companies H & I will report to Genl Hill at Grafton for further orders who will select their camp by order Brig Genl Rosecrans C. Kingsbury A.A.A.G. 37D116pd [page 2] Genl Rosecrans Clarksburg July 30
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Kingsbury, Charles, Jr.
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Headquarters, Army of Western Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
